
describe-stacks
***************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Requests a description of one or more stacks.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws opsworks describe-stacks
     [--stack-ids <value>]


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

None


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

"--stack-ids"  (list of string)
   An array of stack IDs that specify the stacks to be described.

   *Parameter Syntax*

      ["string", ...]
